description: Heartbeat response provided to a CBSD

cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as passed in the heartbeat request.

grantId.description: Unique designator for the grant as passed in the heartbeat request.

transmitExpireTime.description: An RFC3339-formatted string indicating the time the CBSD can transmit until.

grantExpireTime.description: An RFC3339-formatted string indicating the expiry time of the CBSD grant.

heartbeatInterval.description: If present, the CBSD is required to use the indicated heartbeat interval in subsequent heartbeat requests.
